stories.text: I'm reaching out to startup CEOs to test a product proposition and I was wondering if I could help here on hacker news. I would like 20 mins of your time just to do a short interview to understand your needs as a CEO, your relationship to the company accounts and any insights you might be interested in.
stories.title: Ask HN: Startup CEOs, how do you currently get insights from your accounts?
